title.rendered: “IDF and Shin Bet Target Key Hamas Operative Behind October 7 Massacre”

content.rendered:
Joint statement from the IDF Spokesperson and the Shin Bet Spokesperson:

The IDF and Shin Bet have eliminated a terrorist operative who participated in the murderous massacre on October 7 and was actively involved in documenting and spreading attack videos against IDF forces.

In a joint operation by Shin Bet and the IDF, a fighter jet targeted and eliminated Ismail Gol, a member of the military wing of Hamas and a terrorist operative who participated in the murderous massacre on October 7.

Additionally, as part of his role in the military wing, he guided others on how to document the fighting and played an active role in documenting and distributing attack videos against IDF forces. This activity is an integral part of the military operations of the terror organization.

The IDF and Shin Bet are making every effort to target and eliminate terrorists who took part in the massacre on October 7, and they will continue to do so.
